content:
{"name": "St. Mary Star of The Sea", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Some rules need to be put in place they are as follows:
1. **RESPECT** - We expect everyone coming to the pantry to respect the staff and other clients. We would not tolerate anyone being disrespectful or behaving in an unmannerly way, hence, we would ask you to leave. the premises. 
2. **TIME** - Please be on time for your reservation. If you are ten minutes late or more, you will have. to reschedule.
3. **GIVEAWAYS** - Clients from time to time, we do have giveaways. Some of you do not think of others and want to grab everything and go, that has to stop as there is enough for everyone. **PLEASE SHARE**.
4. **RESERVATION** - Please do not call on the day of the pantry asking for a reservation for that day.That will no longer be accepted. Calls must be made at least a week before the appointment. Must leave your **name and telephone number** and someone will return your call.
5. **PANTRY TELEPHONE** - The pantry telephone is a house phone number. Calls are returned after 5:00PM since the food pantry director is not at home during the day.
6. If you do not have a reservation **do not show up at the food pantry**, you will not be attended to.", "email": "", "url": "", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1920 New Haven Avenue", "address_2": "", "city": "Far Rockaway", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11691", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.60075459999999, "longitude": -73.7527042}, "phones": [{"number": "(347) 246-9344", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Wear Facemask"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Only serves surrounding neighborhood"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
